summary: I've been hanging out with teens my age and doing the advertisement thing. I've been talking to older adults who stutter and like their experience. I just wanna work on myself and like how I react to my stutter. I think it's probably easier to talk when I'm with my family or my really close friends. I think it's probably harder when I'm just really stressed about stuff.
quotes: it's probably easier to talk when I'm with my family or my really close friends
it's probably harder when I'm just really stressed about stuff
